scripts.js-min: ./tasks/banner | xargs -0 -I banner uglifyjs src/js/signaler.js --preamble banner -c -m --screw-ie8 -p relative --source-map dist/signaler.min.js.map -o dist/signaler.min.js
scripts.ng-min: ./tasks/banner | xargs -0 -I banner uglifyjs src/js/signaler.js src/angular/signaler.js --preamble banner -c -m --screw-ie8 -p relative --source-map dist/signaler-angular.min.js.map -o dist/signaler-angular.min.js
scripts.min: npm run-script js-min && npm run-script ng-min
